title: Cardsmith
description: At Cardsmith I did a lot of fun stuff like work on an app and also a marketing website. I did user research in the form of user interviews, provided customer service, helped brainstorm feature ideas and implementations and more.

title: Scratch Tab
description: Scratch Tab is a new tab chrome extension that transforms your new tab into an electronic scratch pad; for your thoughts, those links that you want to revisit later but don't want to bookmark, and reminders to take out the trash. Available on the Chrome Web Store.

title: Console.lol
description: Console.lol is an open source library for making debugging a little brighter. It offers visually stimulating console.logs to add visual hierarchy and fun to your browser's console. Will soon be available via NPM.

title: Operations
description: Operations is a web app designed for recording daily activities and expenses for personal reflection. It was also a learning project for implementing a GraphQL API.
